thread.title: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles

title: Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles
text: > Top News Lamar Odom taken from Las Vegas hospital to Los Angeles FILE - In this April 24, 2007, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom sits on the bench during a Western Conference playoff basketball game against the Phoenix Suns in Phoenix. Odom left a Las Vegas hospital and is now in the Los Angeles area to continue his recovery a week after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel, a family representative said Tuesday, Oct. 20, 2015. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin, File)
